verses.verse: <S%H3588>"Surely<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is a <S%H4161>mine<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And a <S%H4725>place<s%> where they <S%H2212>refine<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
<S%H1270>"Iron<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> And from <S%H68>rock<s%> <S%H5154>copper<s%> is <S%H6694>smelted.<s%>

"[Man] <S%H7760>puts<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> And to the <S%H3605>farthest<s%> <S%H8503>limit<s%> he <S%H2713>searches<s%> out The <S%H68>rock<s%> in <S%H652>gloom<s%> and <S%H6757>deep<s%> <S%H6757>shadow.<s%>

"He <S%H6555>sinks<s%> a <S%H5158>shaft<s%> far from <S%H1481>habitation,<s%> <S%H7911>Forgotten<s%> by the <S%H7272>foot;<s%> They <S%H1809>hang<s%> and <S%H5128>swing<s%> to and <S%H5128>fro<s%> far from <S%H582>men.<s%>
"The <S%H776>earth,<s%> from it <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3899>food,<s%> And <S%H8478>underneath<s%> it is <S%H2015>turned<s%> up as <S%H784>fire.<s%>
"Its <S%H68>rocks<s%> are the <S%H4725>source<s%> of <S%H5601>sapphires,<s%> And its <S%H6083>dust<s%> [contains] <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
"The <S%H5410>path<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5861>bird<s%> of <S%H5861>prey<s%> <S%H3045>knows,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> has the falcon's <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7805>caught<s%> <S%H7805>sight<s%> of it.
"The <S%H7830>proud<s%> <S%H1121>beasts<s%> have not <S%H1869>trodden<s%> it, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> has the [fierce] <S%H7826>lion<s%> <S%H9380>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it.
"He <S%H7971>puts<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H2496>flint;<s%> He <S%H2015>overturns<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> at the <S%H8328>base.<s%>
"He <S%H1234>hews<s%> out <S%H2975>channels<s%> through the <S%H6697>rocks;<s%> And his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H3366>precious.<s%>
"He <S%H2280>dams<s%> up the <S%H5104>streams<s%> from <S%H1065>flowing;<s%> And <S%H8587>what<s%> is <S%H8587>hidden<s%> he <S%H3318>brings<s%> out to the <S%H216>light.<s%>
"But <S%H370>where<s%> can <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%>? And <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>?
<S%H582>"Man<s%> does not <S%H3045>know<s%> its <S%H6187>value,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> is it <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
"The <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> 'It is not in me'; And the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> 'It is not with me.'

<S%H5462>"Pure<s%> <S%H5458>gold<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> in <S%H8478>exchange<s%> for it, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> can <S%H3701>silver<s%> be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> as its <S%H4242>price.<s%>
"It <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5541>valued<s%> in the <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> In <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> or <S%H5601>sapphire.<s%>
<S%H2091>"Gold<s%> or <S%H2137>glass<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6186>equal<s%> it, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> can it be <S%H8545>exchanged<s%> for <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H6337>fine<s%> <S%H6337>gold.<s%>
<S%H7215>"Coral<s%> and <S%H1378>crystal<s%> are not to be <S%H2142>mentioned;<s%> And the <S%H4901>acquisition<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H4480>above<s%> [that of] <S%H6443>pearls.<s%>
"The <S%H6357>topaz<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6186>equal<s%> it, <S%H3808>Nor<s%> can it be <S%H5541>valued<s%> in <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold.<s%>
<S%H370>"Where<s%> then does <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> from? And <S%H335>where<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>?
"Thus it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2416>living,<s%> And <S%H5641>concealed<s%> from the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
<S%H11>"Abaddon<s%> and <S%H4194>Death<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> 'With our <S%H241>ears<s%> we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8088>report<s%> of it.'
<S%H430>"God<s%> <S%H995>understands<s%> its <S%H1870>way;<s%> And He <S%H3045>knows<s%> its <S%H4725>place.<s%>
"For He <S%H5027>looks<s%> to the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
"When He <S%H6213>imparted<s%> <S%H4948>weight<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And <S%H8505>meted<s%> out the <S%H4325>waters<s%> by <S%H4060>measure,<s%>
When He <S%H6213>set<s%> a <S%H2706>limit<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> And a <S%H1870>course<s%> for the <S%H6963>thunderbolt,<s%> <S%H2385><s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> He <S%H7200>saw<s%> it and <S%H5608>declared<s%> it; He <S%H3559>established<s%> it and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2713>searched<s%> it out.

"And to <S%H120>man<s%> He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> that is <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> And to <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H9563>evil<s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>'"
